element.name: Description
element.description: An account of the resource

elementText.text: This article looks at how NY is segregated and how school choice affects segregation. It works to counteract the narrative that school segregation is solely a product of housing.

element.name: Title
element.description: A name given to the resource

elementText.text: Why Are New York’s Schools Segregated? It’s Not as Simple as Housing
